hdtIZBRZb8hGk0-C7l0ohg.text: My experience is based on their food truck. I couldn't  finish the chicken hummus bowl I I ordered. Very messy and quickly thrown together, rubbery chicken that wasn't well seasoned (pretty sure it came from a can), mushy carrots, and I couldn't even find the hummus and rice. I'll chalk it up to them not being prepared for a large lunch rush, but they didn't serve anything that would make me a returning customer. Disappointing dish after waiting so long in line.

T96HfvGjtWcnI3WOQTVtBQ.text: Actually, Middle Eastern food is one of our favorites, and we will probably be back -- if we happen to pass by at lunch time, and we are hungry.  But there is nothing about Hummus Xpress that would make it worth a trip.  Like the others of its genre, epitomized by Chipotle Mexican Grill, Hummus Xpress allows you to choose from four presentations (basically the container you want the food served in), four proteins, and various sides.  They build your meal in your container, you pay at the register, find a table, and sit down to enjoy -- well, to enjoy some of it.  The location is small and basic, which is okay, but what is not okay is problems with the food.  The gyro meat, for example, was far too thickly cut so that it did not get that crispy caramelized crust on the outside, and it was luke warm.  The spicy carrots were unevenly cooked, with many pieces raw and others mushy.  The signature hummus was nowhere near as good as the Sabra variety you can buy at a grocery store.  And the pita was dull, cold, and generally substandard.  Some items were quite good, however, such as the braised beef (brisket), kale salad and rice.    But taken on balance, the food is just average.  Hummus Xpress does not rate four or five stars, no matter what standard you judge it by.

IDHcZKp5blTW0r7YdUBUlw.text: One of my favorite lunch spots. Great selection of hummus. Nice workers, good atmosphere

YYuQc3k9fI6apZ_hQqWebg.text: I visited twice in the past week.  I loved the food and the vibe.  I enjoyed the truly authentic falafel both in pita and as a wrap. The restaurant is well laid out, great location.  Avi and crew have created a great vibe.  You feel welcomed and more than just a customer.   Come enjoy a bit of Israel in Ghent.

MjKjSicsYO0N_AeptDbDQA.text: This place is great.. I usually go to pita jungle to get my hummus fix but with this place I have no need (other then pita jungles ahi tuna hummus)... The portions are big, I had food for dinner and lunch the next day when ordering the plate. the price is cheap. Great quality, everything I put in my mouth was delicious....  I was in and out in a matter of minutes with my to go order.  Would/will go back and definitely recommend to my friends and family.

qDdV2c2IOoxDyG_yKcZ6RA.text: Yum Yum Yum !!!    I'm so glad finally a place that does authentic Schwma on the Gyro spit.  Delicious meat and toppings with an assortment of well seasoned veggies.  The guys that work there are super nice and offer tastes if you're unsure of what to get.  Nice fluffy Pita with great hummus.  Everything tasted very fresh and home made. This has become a favorite lunch spot if you want to eat healthy fresh food and are tired of going to Chipotle.

GQRlQ4OQjIVOW7sN4kc6qQ.text: This place would get 5 stars, but the hours are so terrible, and you never know if you're going to get there and see it closed for some reason. When they are open, they can not be beat. I haven't found a more enjoyable mediterranean food experience... when they are actually open that is.

rAxSKSTTzlryOcpakVPtPw.text: Fabulous flavor!  Would love to see more of these restaurants around the valley! I keep trying to come up with excuses to even drive by this place for a quick bite - quite a feat from Scottsdale but well worth the drive!

M6jgYGr51g9M1vCLq7VVVg.text: TOO frickin' die for!  PLEASE open more locations in the Valley!   Great job!

bKq_6bDtlX-PlU0N7WqOyA.text: I really enjoyed it! I got rice, chicken, zucchini, cilantro-jalapeno hummus, pickles, tomatoes and tzatziki. To me less is more, I want to be able to taste each individual element, so I passed on the lentils and other salads. Everything I had was flavorful, and I will be back for more. The iced tea was really great too. Only strange thing was I went in really wanting a pita sandwich, but was pushed into getting a bowl, because the pitas are served open faced. Would have been great to just have the meat, veggies & sauce in a pita wrap!

h9QUvJ7-A7b5GefIc1lHQg.text: It's so easy to eat healthy when food tastes so good!

0N8A-EQIl3J67M2-N1qqAQ.text: Food is excellent!  Portions are large.  The service is fast.  The food is healthy.  The owner served us and was very passionate about his food and restaurant. Id recommend this place to anyone.

Wg_CXXUHTJKqnRFznhuXZQ.text: Yummy, authentic. "Treated like a queen" ;) I had the spiciest hummus version. Lots of food. The drinks are small.

cdiXAG-m-vq-4PFxvblvZw.text: Love it here! Great for any occasion. Employees are very cool and nice people. Stop by sometime if you're looking for something healthy.

o_64JbrlKxCvujSDWRCJfA.text: Now a weekly spot after my first visit.  Fantastic, fresh & authentic Mediterranean food at unbelievable prices. Highly recommend

TefVo-5Rrw66eXY8AZ570A.text: Best food in Tempe!  Gyro is mouthwatering. Tziki sauce outrageous.  So different and healthy.  Yum!  Flavor festival.

R3uSfkpxPHuYws9taErBeQ.text: So far the best middle eastern food I've had in Arizona. It was easy to order and you get lots of good food for the money. I'm planning to be a regular at this place.

LIQXOau7B77JS_SQiyALCQ.text: Pros:  - Good healthy food.  - Lots of vegetarian and Non Veg selection. - Friendly Staff  Cons: - Confusing menu. Needs to be more clear about how many of what you can get from each section. My girl got 2 and I got 1 but we paid the same. Also they need more seasoning in the chicken. No salt whatsoever.  - One spoon of meat? Really for $7-$9 you give one spoon of meat? First time i went in there i got 2 spoons. There need to be consistency with meat portions. I feel like I'm getting robbed depending on whoever is working at that moment gives you the portion he thinks is appropriate for you.  -I dont know how long this place has been open for but they definitely need to clean this place up. The booths are ripped and dirty, should be aligned with the wall instead of having it in the center. There was dirt all over the floor along with a screw on the floor where we were sitting.  - There was this loud vibrating sound coming from the soda machine all this time we were there. Very annoying. Fix it guys.  All in all its a group of young guys running this place including the owner and seems like they are on the right track with their friendly service and healthy food. Just clean it up a little bit and you have  my 5 stars.

D91unRcgUkZGyk-k77wMbQ.text: Awesome food. Great value and service. Highly recommend the hummus and veggies because they were delicious and nutricious!

0kxacc-L_N55PwqDRtvO7w.text: This place never let's me down. Great food and it is clutch when you want something different.don't forget to check in to get the free tea. The egg plant here is fantastic.

QIZIYP2bF4r1Bmj1LoQPHw.text: Excellent food. The amount of choices is great and the employees are very helpful. We confirmed it was our first visit and they walked us through the food choices.  Got the plate with chicken, kale, lentil salad, cucumbers, tomatoes, and zucchini flavored hummus. So good!! My manager for falafel with hers and they made it right then. Great place and will definitely visit again

Jf9YA0L9ou4hWk-tO_AP1A.text: One of the best places to eat in the Tempe area. Very friendly staff with a great variety of food to choose from. Very happy with my experience, will be back very soon.

-n_U-jsF4wsMSNrrJ1LXwA.text: Had a chicken salad with the eggplant. Tried the roasted pepper hummus with it. . Lots of toppings to choose from. It was really good

2_ng2qUju6N2vixbU4MXWA.text: My wife and I love this place.  The food is great, and service is super friendly. They are set up like a Mediterranean Chipotle.  Healthy food (yet super delicious) made just how you want it. Their hummus is some of the best in the valley. All the veggies and veggie salads are delectable.  They have tons of toppings!  You must try this place!

rofuoK_gA88EjZT8BkGUJw.text: Absolutely delicious and authentic food. A/c doesn't work well so it's a little warm this time of year. I will b back but may order it to go ;)

Nr8RQyWf0okRFxtGRkCGTw.text: It's rare that I give a place 5 stars but if you're looking for quick healthy food this is the place for you. Lots of flavor and good customer service.

8jhZrOkjfrm1LbY4t8Dgjw.text: Friendly staff, a large variety of flavors and reasonable prices.  If you are wanting a healthy alternative check them out.

g_xRjrcmuhyZbGKxzTlrhg.text: Love this place. Food is very delicious and the staff some of the most friendly and personal that I've ever met

LfPYC77QKsmgkaUZBsCpgg.text: This place is exactly how everyone else described it... the Chipotle of Mediterranean food. The portions are super gracious and the food is awesome. They even got me excited about vegetables. Everything looked super delicious and I can't wait to go back. The staff was super friendly and I even heard them call customers by their names. I can't wait to go back!

Cc52vxGNIKBt4qN0ARxDSg.text: Absolutely great find, simple but accurate middle eastern food. Service is superb, super nice and patient. Food tastes good, Falafel is lacking and not on par with the rest of the meal. Overall a very pleasant surprise in an unassuming location.

4B0d6lnULm1ZnNLY93pB2g.text: I really do love this place, it's just become too hit or miss. I used to eat here almost every day, along with my staff. The owner Eddie, and Nick always hooked it up and are really friendly. All the other staff they've had over the last couple years make me not want to come back, they'd serve half to a third of the food I used to get, they're not friendly and there was a long spell of risky to the stomach food. I wish I could eat here every day again, I love the food they have on good days.

RbPp7QGQa3uovcm4tOWfBQ.text: Good food but unprofessional employees. Bring it up a notch behavior-wise and you got a great eatery.

M61EqtUdJeuz_QjkOADDKw.text: Wonderful food, great atmosphere!  Love going here for lunch.  Such an array of fresh and unusual flavors. A real treat. The staff are exceedingly friendly and if you are stuck for choice will pick their favorite for you. Even the iced tea is awesome!

9gwnBkJ_RWg4bRUPsX8PFg.text: First time trying this place, and for sure won't be the last time. It was awesome! The service was awesome after telling the person who served us that this was our first. He explained in detail and let us try some samples before we bought. This place will be on our radar from now on when choosing a place to eat.

mZbWfX69kmUl4r5mIiks2Q.text: First time and here and won't be the last! Very friendly and helpful service with amazing Greek/Lebanese food. Reminds me of chipotle service with great portions. Try it out

NaHo3mAW3kDsF0D8CvMZKQ.text: The owner is from Lebanon, and knows some authentic food. The place opened near my house and their sides for food are great. They cook it more authentic than other "pita" joints that just toss some kebab meat on a pita and call it a day. This is the only place that has awesome sides like tabouli salad and roasted eggplant that comes with your meal. They've been known to have live music and crazy business at lunch. Honestly, they have some of the best food and should get recognized for it!

XQnx3Rcm05Ft3e7sfGaeKg.text: Amazing restaurant!  Love the concept of picking your own combinations of food. Great flavor and very unique!  Love all the different types of hummus, veggies, and meats. Great place if you are vegan or gluten free! Love their friendly staff that let's you try samples of hummus. The owner, Eddie, is passionate about the food he serves and is very hospitable.  Very tasty!!

irFOCu3Q5nL9L_6WfoAWAA.text: Awesome food.  Quick.   Healthy.  Friendly service.  Soo glad I found this place.

GadWXXFFeemi3d972pL8Hg.text: WOW, I have eaten some food before, but this is the most unique and therefore the BEST food I have ever eaten. I have eaten at  your  competition three times before and was already starting to get bored  of it. They lack flavor and therefore lost my interest fairly quickly. YOU GUYS ROCK!!! A new loyal customer.  I am going to bring my wife there tomorrow.

DuviyH2uJolJvkHT_kA2og.text: Super friendly staff that stayed open a little later so we could get our fix! Beet Hummus, Kale salad, fresh falafel! I highly recommend EVERYTHING on the menu. Seriously, it's quick and delicious! A rarity in a sea of fried fast-food "restaurants".

YlBn8VhROfu_xilK3lbmzA.text: Tried this place for the first time and was very impressed. The owner/chef made a ton of helpful (and delicious) suggestions, the food was great and the price was on point. We went mid-afternoon time and the food tasted freshly made. Also worth mentioning-this place is very allergy/vegetarian/vegan friendly.

BCBquNOSV0-fyUutTz5QsA.text: This place rocks. Service and food are both great. Would definitely recommend you stop in and try it out

0lvjGudLAl4sV8YRW_BdHA.text: Bland food. Serving wasn't well eg rice was cold, gyro wasn't well done, etc. kale wasnt well cut... not recommended.

U_ZwYyw8FuoZ5eYwvV8O6A.text: Delicious!! Apparently my husband has been going there for months, and just tonight decided to share it with me. I had a salad with chicken and veggies. It was so good! I loved the carrots and eggplant! It was so colorful and fresh! I will for sure go back!! I was not a huge fan of the pita, it was hard and cold, but it did take my husband 25 min to get home with the to go order so I am sure it will be delicious when it is fresh and warm. Completely worth the price and there is enough left over for lunch tomorrow!

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States
Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States

IL3vLkumdlHYQItsThVC0Q.text: Just finished our take out order from Hummus Express and we both enjoyed EVERY DELICIOUS BITE!!  Had a little extra time before picking up hubby at airport and happened to see this place while driving by. Pulled into parking lot to check Yelp reviews and decided to give it a try.  Ordered two plates to go with all of my favorites and must've guessed right for hubby because he devoured it when we got home and settled.   This is our favorite type of food to make, but soooooo much easier than buying, prepping and plating all of these amazing ingredients, having plenty leftover to enjoy tomorrow!!  Oh yeah, the eggplant is AMAZING!! I don't really care for eggplant, but several review comments made me give it a try... will definitely get that again when in the neighborhood.   The baklava was off the charts!! Flakey, buttery, honey-loving slices of heaven, and I know my baklava, baby!! YUM!

jpkhyV4ojrHose_axJXJKw.text: Absolute delicious and authentic. Easy to order, no waiting. Explosions of flavor, very healthy as well. Great customer service, nice little location, across the board 5 Stars. A coworker and I went in for a quick lunch and I was impressed. Yelp steers us to a great place and we will be back for sure! I had a "plate" which was more than enough with Gyro meat and grilled chicken and all the trimmings. Legit Mediterranean cuisine. YUM!

3QLouUjHp8ZfaE38f7xuZw.text: Great food, terrible service. This place is mostly operated by college students who all seem like they don't want to be there. As you go down the line with your order, different employees assemble your plate (kind of like Subway). Two of the three employees mumbled so much and were upset when I asked them to repeat themselves so I could hesr them over the exhaust fans behind them. If you don't know what you want right away, even though all the food options are spread down the counter and you have to go through the whole line to see the available options, you will get many sighs of frustration from the employees. Apart from the attitudes of most of the employees, the veggie options are great. I just wish the folks running the place would realize the impact a crappy attitude has on people paying for your services.

PWWR3PerhNU9hunKH_BLUA.text: Okay, I have been on the hunt for a place to eat that was healthy. I am a boy mom and am out numbered 3:1. They love meat, I'm a veggie girl. This place was perfect for all of us. Lots of vegan, veggie and meat options for anyone. We each got something different and loved it. Husband and his friend are keto also, they loved it. Just beware that the jalapeno cilantro hummus is hot! If you like spicy- this is the one for you!:) We will be back for sure. Friendly staff as well

qo3WWKCdT5RMwlBV7YO7ww.text: I really shouldn't give 5 stars because they forgot my pita.  But the meal was so good and HUGE I didn't even miss the pita.  I ordered through grub hub and picked up my order on it way home. It was ready and waiting for me when I got there 20min later.  Girls at front were pleasant and handed my meal over with a smile and "enjoy".  Will definitely come here again.

RTdqx5Vj1o7X_YXn39blHg.text: Working from home the man surprised me and brought lunch home from here! Falafel wrap and saffron rice! Yummy! Def recommend a try!  I'll be back again!

3hSZlzpldWVzsTANWQJskw.text: Never really go wrong at the Humms Xpress!! I love this place. It is very small inside so be prepared to meet a new friend. The food is really good. They staff are really informative and they will give you great suggestions. I personally recommend the Jalapeno Humms with tabouli salad! Give this place a try. It my not look like much on the outside but very delicious on the inside!

pBhjyKS4Yl_iQp4H5cQjmw.text: This is one of quick and easy to access places when you are super hungry and want your healthy options as soon as possible and as quick as possible. I chose pita with different Mediterranean toppings like olives and spicy hummus. There was no wait there right after 5:00 p.m. I decided to pick up a desert which was delicious but a bit too buttery. I've scoured a free iced tea by checking in on Yelp. It was a pretty good tea too. The only thing I had a problem with was a small bowl and a slice of baklava over $12! It's pricy for such a simple and quick meal. I would come back because it is a very convenient place that serves you quick.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States

KT0sl0LGg_SEqVE4g2Vjhw.text: If you like Chipolte,you'll like this place. Food is prepared in a bowl, just like Chipolte. Don't really care for Chipolte myself, sorry. Don't like food stuffed into a small container and not being able to enjoy and taste the food individually.  Bathroom was in the back, down the hall pass the kitchen! Yikes! Not very kid friendly, got worried about my child and had to stop giving my order to go and check she was ok. Can't trust anyone! Food by itself, was good. Will only stop in if very hungry and stuck in traffic.

qqx4LP4WfKJ_sPCymOC0_Q.text: Love the food at this place...it definitely gets busy during the weekday lunch rush so plan to wait 15+ minutes in line. They also have a tendency to put online orders ahead of customers waiting in line which I never quite understood.   Overall, great food and nice employees just not the place  you should head if you're in a rush.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Customers waiting in line for many minutes while the employees work on an online order.

r0nqNadaIefYscJqryhPow.text: My first time at Hummus Xpress was less than a month ago. I stopped in about 30 minutes before close. The wide-eyed look of confusion on my face alerted the employees that I was a newbie. Even though it was almost closing time they were super nice.   The employees kindly explained the whole process: the difference between sizes (bowl or plate), fillings (various hot veggies, hummus, and salads) toppings, and prices ($0.65 for additional fillings). They gave me a bunch of samples to help my indecision. Thankfully the store was pretty empty - I wouldn't suggest doing this during the lunchtime rush. There really are so many options to choose from spicy to sweet, savory, meaty or just veggies - it is totally customizable!   So I got ALL the things!! ... er, pretty close to All THE THINGS!   My favorites being the rice, the fried eggplant, and the lemon ginger hummus (though all the hummus has been delicious). I've been back a few times now since that first visit and each time I've ate the whole bowl in one sitting! Yup, it just that good.

Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Chicken bowl w rice, fried eggplant, kale, zucchini, lemon ginger hummus, tomatoes, beets, white bean salad, tzatziki sauce &amp; garlic aioli.

KviX6b726taRunPetpKciQ.text: Cute little hole in the wall. Its in a strip mall, but wow the food is amazing. I got a hummus bowl salad with chicken, garlic hummus, feta, tomatoes, grilled veggies, and a garlic sauce. Soooo good. I mean I wish there were more healthy places to eat, that tasted this good.

8mtSDUsZOAdu8op7IwUlLw.text: Ate here for lunch and didn't know what to expect due to the area and the small size but holy cow was the food good. Many options to choose from.  Staff was friendly and prices are fair.

kfz-Lx-PRfVtu65qzx2A3Q.text: Amazing food Visit this place often   Love hummus but today was just a horrible experience

nfaFLK7kZ5gZBZX7gVXR7Q.text: Quick and Healthy dining when you in a hurry its no exuses to eat junk! I enjoy the bowl with chicken and grilled veggies. Gotta try the eggplants is grilled and seasoned perfectly !!

bywOnI6vtsx3wK6HdsagRg.text: Totally love this place! Great food and comfortable atmosphere, always feel welcome whether I take a friend or go solo. Usually get the falafel because it's awesome but wanted a salad today and it did not disappoint! They build it right in front of you and offer suggestions if you feel a bit overwhelmed. And don't be afraid to go out of your culinary comfort zone because it is all delicious, and every combo you can think of will taste great!

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Lemon chicken salad w cilantro jalapeño hummus

1ZcRoRF62VHmVEfRw68oqw.text: Must try the fried eggplant! It's delicious along with everything else! I've had the chicken and the braised beef, both equally yummy! Also the lemon ginger hummus is very tasty!!

SkGY4OXCZFVWfQQznPUk7w.text: This place is great! The staff is efficient and friendly when choosing your options and there is plenty of parking.   The food is fantastic! If you like Mediterranean style, then I don't see a need for anywhere else. Prices are reasonable and the portions are the perfect size. I elect to get the plate w/gyro meat rice and 2 sides w/salad , hummus and a pita. Do it. You won't regret going if you like Mediterranean style.

Rj8DD-DkooCuJo5Dn0vGag.text: I've been coming here regularly over the last two years for their vegetarian plate, and it's normally amazing! However, the last three times I've eaten here the eggplant has been over cooked and way over salted. I'm really disappointed as this was one of my favorite restaurants. It's a little pricey, and when you can't even eat all of your veggies because half of them taste like salty jerky, it's really not worth it.

kxv_8_kd_1bCR7v9RucplQ.text: I have been here twice now and each time the food has been phenomenal.  I preferred the chipotle hummus over the super popular cilantro jalapeno.   The lemon broccoli is probably the best broccoli I have ever had.  The tahini and garlic aoli sauces were divine.  I didn't particularly care for the recommended potato salad today but only because it was a flavor I'm not fond of, the quality and freshness was all there.    One complaint.  At the expense of sounding like an old fuddy duddy...while I was there for lunch they were blasting disco music so loud I could not hear the guy taking my order or have a decent conversation with my husband.  It was fine for a bar atmosphere but too loud for a Monday lunch date.    However, this will definitely be my weekly lunch spot for a while.

z0shfp5IOk7zd2XlUPxNrA.text: Obsessed with this place. The bowls are so good and so big because you get to add whatever In it ! The kale salad is to die for and so is the rice and hummus.  I love how you can put as much veggies as you so I always load up on those.  Been here 2 days in a row

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States

R5gPFzvt6lRxB_qTALkJRw.text: First time coming here and they were incredibly helpful and kind. The food will not disappoint either.

HjzCCFxN9swIwOEBs_eq9Q.text: Great service! Happy people! We ordered 2 vegan lunch specials and everyone was so helpful. The food was delicious and huge portions. Thank you!

FlN0b60uTt0KYL4m4pGJ5A.text: These guys are the best Greek food hands down. Gyro meat is on point, incredible selection of veggies and hummus. Amazing for vegans and meat lovers alike. Definitely worth supporting this great local establishment.

251KDFa2socx0Fyt8-jqFA.text: In the area and the reviews were great so we stopped. I am so glad we did. Great food. It's like a Mediterranean style Chipotle. Everything is fresh and tastes wonderful. We voth got bowls, and we were so full we didn't eat it all.

YdQQJ940FSVL7Lw_e1lVpQ.text: I went to this place because I needed something to eat on my lunch work break and I try to take the fun relatively healthy approach.  This is NOT another Pita Pit. The owner/CHEF Eddie is right there working hard.  It's like gourmet food to go.  He compared it as the Chipotle of Mediterranean cuisine, I agree but even more so. He told me how the pitas come from a local bakery fresh (can't remember name), and he was most exuberant describing everything.  There were a lot of choices and I didn't know where to start because I don't know this cuisine and Eddie was more than happy to put together a pita combination as he is a chef. He asked me if I wanted vegetarian or not and then he went down the line putting a combination together for me on the fly working with my preferences.  When I finally had my pita (see picture) the flavors were awesome! I was tasting something I could very happily eat in a sit down restaurant. I do not know where else you can get such a high quality food quickly and for a decent cost.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Delicious pita!

h8IFe7VHf2K4s4FCfy2e0g.text: If you're looking to grab a bite to eat in the Tempe area, I highly recommend this place! Not only does this place have thee best hummus in town, the food is always on point. I have yet to be disappointed after coming here. Food is delicious not to mention they have a lot of vegetarian and vegan options. The owners are super chill, and usually there helping out the team and always friendly. You can tell they truly care about the quality of their food and the happiness of their customers. I can say after trying every single hummus; jalapeno cilantro is still my favorite. Why would you not like this place?!

FUXSEIFe0ZpR2dwb8C4fFg.text: It's like an awesome Mediterranean food Chipotle! Pick what you want for your bowl and chow down! They have excellent hummus too which is a plus since it's in their name. If you haven't tried them don't miss out. If it's been a while what are you waiting for!

-qlr74a-ZraWj0SaENHArQ.text: Thought this place was ok. It's a cool concept. Wasn't a fan of the Tahiti sauce... Had absolutely no flavor. Some items in my bowl were super hot and others cold. Lots of overpowering flavors but I'd probably be back.

Sq5hc2H5iFFYQmEI359vfg.text: Maybe I should've known that this wasn't my type of place, as I dread Chipotle-style assembly-line food, but I do love Mediterranean food, and Chipotle-style greek and Mediterranean seem to be all the rage these days. I have to say, though, that while I admire the number of options offered here (many more than Chipotle itself), the food didn't taste particularly authentic to me.  I chose to forego meat for falafel, and this may have been my first mistake. The falafel I got lacked the satisfying crunch I look for, and was frankly pretty bland. The pita was lacking as well, and was more the texture of grocery store pita than proper pita, which is generally far less doughy. Honestly, I let the owner recommend most of the items I chose for the bowl, as I wanted to make sure they'd go together well. They didn't, and it tasted more like a random jumble of food than a Mediterranean meal. It was certainly an ok value for the price, but that doesn't mean much when it doesn't taste that good.

q_kzkHZnjQ1FNaLj4bj6sA.text: I have to dock a star because we've stopped here several times when they were closed but their posted hours said they should be open. In fact, that happened three times and I didn't want to try again, but today we decided to stop in. It's a really great concept, kind of like a Mediterranean chipotle. They are super concerned about food costs and therefore quite inflexible about substitutions. I can understand, although the way the bowls are structured, it's hard to avoid certain ingredients that aren't universally liked. Overall, we really enjoyed the food. everything was super flavorful, especially the eggplant.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Bowl

hM_TfWD9s_B7Sm9AnoG9YQ.text: SUPER TASTY, Friendly Staff, FREE TEA with a YELP CHECK IN. I had the Tasty Falafel. The traditional hummus was very tasty. I had the tabouleh salad. Very tasty. The tzatziki sauce is made with yogurt. The tzatziki sauce is very good. Small dining room. Maybe 40 people max. Good access to Interstate 10. Easy to find.

hXT4k6XB3y4N3w66yCIBkw.text: Are you kidding me? How does this place have so many good reviews? The chicken is cold and old, the beef is soggy and also old,the hummus tastes worse than the one you can buy in a grocery stores, the pita is cold and hard, there was literally not a single good thing in my bowl. The only good thing about this place is that that the guy who helped us was pretty nice, but the food is absolutely disgusting.

Ojk1mM1yXWPYI36zVwH5OQ.text: Food is moderate with a modern twist, honestly had better.  A lil over priced for the quantity served on a small plate. Although the place is clean and had friendly staff.  Personally, I've never went back for seconds.

fRTuZyml39fIVYNrJEgxNg.text: If you haven't been here, you're doing yourself a True disservice. Their hours are a little frustrating with my work schedule, but the one day a week where I actually can go, I go. The food is ALWAYS fresh. Tons of vegan options too, if that's your thing. Prices are excellent and the portions are huge. Customer service is also top notch. I've tried to find one, but I seriously do not have one knock against this place besides the hours of operation. Best food in Tempe.

sQTOkuaTlTDnmwnJEt0y5Q.text: My Friend told me about it and I visited Hummus Xpress along with her. My God Food is yummy. It has it's taste not bland at all. So I bought Hummus with fill ins i.e $3.99 and .67 on extra filling. So to plan on a budget of $5.50 I bought Hummus (Beet Flavor Hummus) with Saffron Rice, Eggplant, Olives, Feta Cheese. "What a healthy meal Ahh" .Food is delicious, fresh, higher quality food in good price. Totally worth it. If you are lucky you will receive nice greetings from Amad. His service is excellent and you will want to revisit for sure. I got the same food for "To Go" And sensible girl i.e Precious. is good and very nice too. I was taken away with Amad's service.  The $3.99 Deal is as follows: Pick 1 in each for any extra I think it is $ 0.67 more. 1.Types of Hummus : Beet Hummus, Classic Hummus,Chipotle Hummus, Basil Parsley Hummus, Arugla Hummus, Jalapeno Hummus, Ginger Hummus 2.Types of Fillings : Saffron Rice, Beans, Eggplant, Tofu, Carrots, Meats etc 3.Types of Salad: Tabouli Salad, Kale Salad, Kale with Wheat Salad 4.Types Of Salad( Single):  Tomatoes, Olives, Beetroots, Cucumbers, Jalapenos , Bell peppers, Spring onion green leaf rounds 5.Other Filling Types: Feta Cheese, and there were 4 More  And you get Free Pita (Wheat/White) Bread along with Hummus with Fillings. What more can you ask for ?  Overall very delicious and authentic food with excellent service.  Supper !!! We went at 2:15 afternoon.Wasn't much busy But on earlier visit was really really full house Usually 11 till 2 very busy. Not sure about evening as of now. Try and relish food. I am sure you will love the food.
