AxmHF1XVBJM7NKMGV7Y7TA.text: Just YES! These ginger carrots I had in my bowl this afternoon...to die for! Eat here! You get a TON of food for a great price, and everyone there is super friendly and helpful.

HMKN5q_1hXK_dOZhnEIdlQ.text: I love Yelp for helping me find this place. Unassuming exterior, located in a strip mall, and most likely not a place I would have tried without the rave reviews on yelp. I would have missed out, big time.  It was suggested I try a bowl since it was my first visit. Layered with Saffron rice on the bottom, the guys were really generous in letting me sample a variety of items rather than limit me to what is typically included. Both lamb and chicken were good, but to me there was no contest - the lamb was melt-in-your-mouth good. Curried carrots had so much flavor, as did the kale. Grilled eggplant and tomato had fantastic char-flavor and texture. They make all their own hummus, and it was truly inspired. I went with the beet hummus since it was deliciously rich. Tahini sauce and red chile sauce made for the perfect accent.  My meal was $7.95 and included a pita. I'm a big eater but even I had leftovers.   The format reminded me of Chipotle but the food was much more authentic and delicious. One of the guys is from Lebanon. They were genuinely grateful for my visit and I assure you, it won't be my last.

O_UYnq1rbAfeak6LEBIavg.text: Many options to choose from, great quality and everything is made fresh. Staff is very helpful and gives great advice on what to mix and match. You have to try everything and try different combos. Very clean and always kinda busy for lunch. Gyro meat could be sliced a little thinner but oh well. I see people comparing this place to Chipotle...same concept, sure, but like any other "assembly line" food places, YOU pick what you want. If your bowl didn't come out to your liking, uhh, hello, your fault. Unless you're complaining about the actual quality/flavor of the food, comparing Hummus Xpress to Chipotle is pointless.

o20C8ZMEM701FLuyTm42xw.text: I was only in Phoenix two days and ate here twice, that should tell you something! Pick a pita, bowl, or plate and call out your favorites. You get proteins, vegetables, rice, hummus and add ons and sauces, so lots of possible combinations. The falafel were great, fried eggplant was friggin' delicious. Hummus came in at least six different flavors, I tried the chipotle and roasted red pepper, both were fantastic. Tabbouleh fresh, lentil kale salad was off the chain. Service at the counter was above average. Maybe i need to move to Phoenix.

sxf7R4jdyh4BlrxqQnlnNQ.text: I stumbled upon this place on yelp, saw the amazing reviews and decided I had to give-er-a-go.  The ordering process is a little confusing but the employees are very helpful. I believe the owner  made my bowl of awesome, and he was very cheery.  I was a little hesitant on how I would like the food because all of the ingredients were pretty much piled on each other, but I was very surprised that all the flavors mixed perfectly together.  I ordered the bowl and had gyro, saffron rice, roasted potatoes, onions, tomatoes, green onions, chipotle hummus, lentil salad, garbanzo beans, feta cheese and just a touch of tahini sauce.  I was starting to feel a little full halfway through the bowl, but the food was so great that I couldn't put it down.  I'll definitely be back and I'm really excited that there is finally a good restaurant in that strip mall!!!

YdMgXPESwTlDkU2FptSDjA.text: This place was TASTY!! It was a bit confusing at first figuring out how to order, but the owner was great and explained it all. I ended up with a hummus bowl + falafel for only like $5. The falafel were fresh and I liked both hummus's (hummusi? hummuses? hummus's?). I tried the red pepper and jalepeno ones.   They also have shug. For those of you that don't know, shug is incredible. It's so spicy and amazing and no falafel/hummus feast is complete without it, yet it's annoyingly hard to find here. Hummus Xpress has deliciously fiery lovely shug that made my day.   Overall, great place to check out and hopefully they open more locations!

Bauts2ZrtKs7biR7o-MFrg.text: This place is different in that it brings a quick "build your own" bowl approach to Mediterranean food.  That part I like, and what really blew my mind was how well they pulled it off.  The place is casual, rather small and they have a very simple and straight forward approach to offering a myriad of ingredients (all of which are exceptional... at least the ones I've tried.)  I found this place because they've catered a few lunches at my office and always were delicious, so I finally went there on my own today and it was quite good.  If you like garlic, hummus, really delicious gyro meat, lots of tasty and uniquely prepared veggies and sauces served up in an authentic, fast friendly yet not chainy at all way, I would say it's worth a try.  I drove from Warner and Hardy all the way up there for lunch and it will be the first of many trips.

nuiFeZgVrpzR9BFRwonyRg.text: Place is the bomb, never had a bad experience, just only wish they were open later, hopefully this place never leaves Tempe

wBRy3UOC-HY-y5wrSAkVTQ.text: Great staff and great food. Enough options to have some variety each visit...or you can just stick to your favorite combos. My mouth's watering just thinking about today's lunch.  I'll definitely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States

DxMU5y7T5TrGfni3R9D5IQ.text: Hands down my go-to healthy food stop.  Staff are ALWAYS friendly and the food is fresh and made with love. Never disappointed when I walk into these doors. Please don't ever go anywhere...if anything expand and share the love around the valley!

4cvqdYlyDMcQbpR_g-Opiw.text: Best Mediterranean joint in Tempe, hands down! Eddie, the owner, is a master of the art, and his expertise shines at Hummus Xpress!   The atmosphere here is comfortable and inviting. Live music, plenty of customers (but not too many), and some of the most friendly employees I've experienced. And the food is FANTASTIC! Eddie crafted an exquisite dish, with jalapeno hummus, lamb, lentil, and poached mushrooms. It was a remarkably delicious dish for only $8.50!   Hummus Xpress is bound to take over Phoenix. This restaurant has everything you want in the perfect Mediterranean lunch spot.

JGpk6eo19bByYxuPfrZWpw.text: This place is great!  I had lunch at Hummus Xpress for the first time today and I will be back for more.  I had a "bowl" and filled it with rice pilaf, gyro meat, ginger glazed carrots, jalapeno cilantro hummus, lentil kale salad and chose the whole wheat pita.  There are lot's of combinations to choose from and I will what to give them all a try.  Don't be put off by the neighborhood, it's industrial and little dated.  The food is great, the service is great, and it's easy find and to get to.  Recommended!

CD_upNIx78-Wm_l-XIIZgg.text: Their name makes them sound like a cheesy franchise, but Hummus Xpress is anything but.  Home cooked. Delicious. Fresh. Healthy. Great quick service.  Couldn't ask for more, except maybe for the falafel to be a bit tastier.  I get the chicken plate with rice, broccoli, potatoes, hummus, olives, feta and lentil and kale salad. A meal like that will cost you a little bit more than ten bucks, but is well worth it.  Pretty hip atmosphere with chipotle-style food serving.  They've got a few talented local musicians who play jazz guitar every once in awhile.

7SwKZjjoeoj5AXh3sJ7iJA.text: Service 5/5: owner and employees were very helpful and genuine.   Food 5/5: I am Lebanese and while my family does some dishes slightly different it is overall really good. I respect the fact that they don't hold back on garlic in the hummos      Overall experience 5/5: they really made the place look nice from what it previously was, food and service very good

KV72mztJRNMaPlCBhZD1Ow.text: Finally remembered to try this place, and I should have done it sooner.  Staff:  Insanely friendly and helpful  Selection: Pretty much have everything.  Tons of options for the gluten-free, vegetarian, or us carnivores.  I enjoy the vegetarian options as a change up and this place has variety to fit a wide array of tastes.  Food:  I was a bit overwhelmed by the options so there was no method to my madness.  It really was delicious and the portions were huge.  I went with the Gyro, some kale veggie, the basil hummus, rice, etc, etc.... too much to list.  I went with the bowl while my gf went with the salad.    This place blew us away in all aspects.  Definitely plan on going back.  Only mini critique is to stay open later for us dinner procrastinators!

f076vsc-7pchm67vwQceIg.text: Superb service! Very very fast and the flavors were mouthwatering.  If you are considering anything in this area, H Xpress is your WiNNeR!!!    Will be back, a few times a week!

M91C7FXbiGGcCw-KuhgoIQ.text: The food is great and is my usual go-to whenever I am feeling Mediterranean or Lebanese. However for some reason I tried to visit last week and there was a sign on the door saying they were temporarily closed. I drove over 10 miles. Sucks because food is awesome here. Also another little complaint is sometimes they can be a little stingy with their portions, especially with the hummus and dressings. Overall tho, it doesnt stop me from going there and eating their food.

UVCDHKtC7Mes4xEUKGIOxA.text: I worked in Tempe for years and finally someone introduced me to Hummus Express.  Tons of options and food for the price.  I have brought 5 people there for the first time and they raved about it to their friends.  It is a Mediterranean version of Chipotle with more and better options

j8l61_70ZkKQJx1T11vCVQ.text: Large portions and very fresh and flavorful. I had a plate consisting of chicken, lamb, hummus, and several veggies and sauces.   They have a large selection of humus and yummy dishes. Several are quite spicy so be careful.  If I lived here I would be a regular. I just ate and I want to go back for more. Would make a great take out too.

Ucjou89h7h-sTsiDsJbOYA.text: I am half way done eating my meal and I couldn't yelp this place fast enough!  I got a plate with beef and gyro.  The beef was a recommendation by a employee.  The beef was/is AMAZING!  The meats were all warm.  The carrots were spicy and delish!  They gave me a ton of kalamata olives which I LOVE.  The portions are beyond generous.    This place is top notch and I will definitely be back!

Q9IRgUyalEELqyPP5El6PA.text: Coming from the taboolie mooley. I can say it's good az food. Take your photo here ginger lemon hummus. Staff is very informative and inspired.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Hummus spelled backwards!!! Summuh timeeeeee.

HiiXMeZjZbDMtKOPwl4BtQ.text: Not only is the food absolutely delicious, The service is absolutely incredible. Even though we no longer live in Tempe, we make an extra special trip just to come here. The food is authentic and their vegetable selection it offers a wide variety. I love the cilantro hummus and the beet hummus.  The service though is top notch. The staff is so friendly and helped my nine-year-old son choose the best stuff for his plate. We will be back time and time again. We love you Hummus Xpress!!!!

z3vOdHwtKZFYMt5r8gyxsA.text: Been to this place twice. I live in New Mexico. I was there a second time because I made sure to book the same hotel so I'd be close to this place.  SO good. Lemonade with rosewater! Braised kale. Delicious chick pea and lentil salads. GREAT falafal. Good tzaziki. YUMMY baklavah.  Had leftovers that I scarfed a few hours later at my hotel. I have a roving palate, but there was nothing I wanted more than more of my Hummus Xpress.   Call first. I was sad to find out they were closed pretty early on the weekends.

9A1grWhQPWYqydXPYpfx2g.text: Chipotle...um I mean Hummus Xpress.  Actually, the only reference to Chipotle is so that you understand how the ordering is done. (Because who hasn't been to a chipotle right). You start and can order a bowl, giro, or salad and then you get to make all of your wonderful selection.    This was yummy yummy in my tummy.  Just remember to go easy on all the sauce options if your are trying to stay healthy which by the way, you can totally do here if you would like.

AKDkyTWWWXIoj7ToAWozRw.text: I've been to hummus express maybe 3 or 4 times now, and I must say they are hard to beat when it comes to speed, flavor, and portion size. I've always gotten a hummus bowl, but recently got the pita instead and you get more than enough food that it's an even better value. For the hot veggies, I absolutely recommend either fried eggplant or their grilled zucchini (my new favorite), and the tabbouleh salad is quite good as well. Their gyro is a bit fattier than I'd prefer, but I still can't get enough of it. You can get as many toppings as you'd like too!  This place is an absolute gem and a must for either lunch or dinner

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. This place is so damn good I forgot to snap a picture before eating

2LzvcXwjVKLE5aHnYSX4zw.text: Food is amazing. Get plate! w/ pita on the side. Amazing.... Eggplant, Zucchini, Brazed beef, Gyro, multiple flavors of hummus specially Lemon hummus. Beets, Fetta, Potatoes. Veggies are amazing. So many options to make your own... The Garlic chili sauce has a mouth watering zing that you crave weeks later...

AcLk_HSouznaWVedN1EuMw.text: Delicious, fresh and healthy! Huge portions and a great deal. Do yourself a favor and get sauce on the side so you can take some to go. Everyone that worked there was nice and welcoming. Servers helped first timers figure out the menu.

t2MraauE_2eQqsdpfa5UNQ.text: Everything was outstanding.  Lunch bowl with rice, chicken, broccoli, jalapeno cilantro hummus, tabbouleh, + toppings and pita for under $10. What's not to like?

lxDk5BQ6szqtJcQApImj0g.text: First time eating eggplant.  Love it.  Chipotle Hummus is my favorite.  As a vegan, the Three Vegetables are enough, as you can pick toppings and sauces.   --  The PITA is cheaper than the bowl, with the same portion of food.   You can't go wrong with any of the options here.  Very clean, professional, super friendly, and Xtremely worth the 6.95 at Hummus Xpress.

F5IEP2huzLOxCj-dnlYvuA.text: Can I just tell you how much I LOVE THIS PLACE?  Luckily I work close by, so I come once a week.  Falafel kicks ass - so I normally get a plate with chicken.  The lemon kale is awesome - and honestly, who gets excited about kale?  The rice is so very good - I think it has sumac?  Anyway, it's delightful.  The hummus is great - I enjoy the roasted red pepper, the white bean salad and Tzatziki are lovely.   It's a huge amount of food for $10, so get going!

m-DIuvHbI9E-ydLwprzGyQ.text: Absolutely amazing hummus, and the guys in the truck are just the best! Polite, fun, delicious, it's a great experience all around, and the food is top notch!

igyjQXcEMvMA6MjoFpcJZA.text: Best Mediterranean food on the planet! Falafel is perfect and the variety of options are endless. Love that there are always new flavors of hummus. Sad that the only location is in Tempe and hope that one day they can expand! (Come to the west side!!!!)

yRIHxKJGuoDrlwM2GGEBEA.text: Hands down the best humus and vegetables around! My new favorite place! Clean, awesome staff friendly and great music to listen too while you munch

pyh2WfAmfZg2A0I0piZG0Q.text: We got bowls mixed with classic and jalapeno hummus, with pickled veggies, eggplant and pepperoncinis with some whole wheat pita. I kid you not, my dining companion licked the bowl.  I wanted to, but I managed to scrape the bowl clean and then i admit, I used my fingers too...unbelievably delicious.  Now, if he just delivered, I'd spend all my money here!

-JHnOzlRf0d-nVgSKmmqXA.text: There's been enough reviews about the style of service here, so I'll restrict this to the food and the customer service. The food is phenomenal and it's clear that care, thought, and effort are put into each item. I came here in a party of 4 and everyone cleaned their plate. With how generous their portions are, that's impressive.  There's been some complaints in these reviews about the staff being impatient. My experience is that the staff absolutely expects you to know what you want, because you're an adult, but I didn't encounter any sass or frustration from the staff. Furthermore, two of my party were real, real old. Despite being confused and difficult to deal with, the staff treated them very well and were very patient.  All in all this was a great lunch, and I'll be back soon. I expected nothing less from a guy who made me actually miss a pizzeria, and Eddie did not disappoint.

QoRlZzPEG014kHmADnp1xA.text: This place is delicious I came here for the first time today and everyone was really helpful in choosing what was good. The food itself is fresh

HTbk2bapSYO867UFvfnJVA.text: This place is a gem. I've been coming here for a few years now. It's one of places in Tempe where you can actually eat healthy. The staff is super friendly. The food is consistently delicious. You guys are nailing It

eKTWx6dF-WpdHoCIxaIxeQ.text: This place is a gem. Great food, tons of flavor, and prices that don't break the bank. I really love their eggplant... which sounds weird to say but it awesome, give it try!

TtTrEgDni2nVU6Klj9oswA.text: When you walk into this place it just smells phenomenal and reaffirms your decision to eat here.  I got the vegetarian pita and it was so delicious. The eggplant is so tasty and the potatoes go nicely with it. The roasted red pepper hummus is great, I paired it with tzatziki sauce. So good.  If given the chance to eat it again I would chose a different game plan (I cut into the bottom of the container with my knife- rookie mistake).

gPGhh7NkEgjzA-rEndnNKw.text: The food was very good, but the customer service was bad.   Arriving during a lunch break, I was happy there wasn't a line. The toppings - "fill-its" - were fresh and I liked the choices. The place was relatively clean.   But the crew treat people impatiently. They give you this look, half expecting you to rapid-fire your selections because (what, there's something else they should be doing) and half impatient that the line doesn't move faster or that they don't want to answer your questions. This is how it goes:  Dude: "what do you want?" You: "cabbage please" Dude: * pinches out three scraps of red cabbage * what else you want? You: can I get more cabbage please? Dude: * wags his head * Sorry! We're all about portion control here. Manager. What else you want? You: can I get olives Dude: you can get whatever you want as long as you know what you want  (Direct quote)  Hopefully it was just a bad shift cause the customer service sucks. But the food was good. My coworkers laughed because ordering was an exercise in patience and negotiating. Be prepared to do battle with those dudes.

G2HOH11l4hPlcheO4snlcA.text: This place is so good! Lots of vegan options!!! Fresh and so flavorful. The employees are really nice too. Can't wait to come back. Great for a quick and healthy meal.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States

BeMrbz-coqW_-dga-zxyJw.text: Long on my list of quick lunch places to try, I finally made it to Hummus Xpress. And, I have hence determined this is an immensely dangerous find as I work nearby and will have to give them all my lunch money in exchange for tasty Mediterranean food.   Similar to the Chipotle-style of choosing your ingredients (and having no one to blame but yourself if the combo is questionable), you first choose between a bowl, salad, pita or plate. Then all the options begins...   Chicken, braised beef, falafel, veggies, or gyro leads to a selection of 7 hot veggies ranging from lemon kale to fried eggplant. Then you made choice on 6 different hummus flavors (cilantro jalapeno actually has a bit of a kick!) Then salad choices (tabouli, kale onion, lentil kale) to finally finish off with an impressive array of toppings. Everything is full of flavor and cooked well, and the staff was efficient and nice.   I'm already plotting my next bowl for my return visit.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Bowl with gyro, lemon kale, rice, tabouli, veggies, jalapeño hummus, and lots more with a whole wheat pita.

04i_8Rj8lYiFc5XVyMXU_Q.text: How have I not reviewed this place yet? Coworker (vegetarian) never knew veggie dishes could taste this good, and his carnivorous partner in crime (moi) is happy with their gyro meat and sometimes crazy hummus options. A nice mix of Mediterranean inspirations- sometimes Moroccan veggies, some Greek inspired options, more Middle Eastern things, many with modern twists...all of them in a "build it your way" Chipotle-esque style. And check in for free tea! Yah! Best tabbouleh in town, p.s.

mEOX5Tm0Pygj5y26RGY-6A.text: I used to go hear with empty stomach, but now the prices have gone up and the food portions have gone down.... time to move on.  They do have good food though.. cant just bash them.

pdMLi9hieTo69wyMBXJGqA.text: Hummus Xpress is a healthy, authentic restaurant that's great for lunch! I explain it as a chipotle for hummus(so clearly better). I always get the bowl, lamb or chicken, rice, red pepper hummus, and all the toppings I want. I leave feeling full and healthy and recommend this play to anyone. Not to mention, the staff is incredible and super accommodating/helpful!

mNbe7iqDN1ti9T0fuhSlZA.text: Very good place to eat but I wish they would be more generous with their taboule/sauce portions, shouldn't only give the choice for one sauce because that makes the food dry and needs more of the sauce. We shouldn't have to pay extra for each sauce. Where is the Tahini sauce? Tahini sauce would be the perfect addition!!

IOloVIXnUYM_WU8HgdljtA.text: My first time eating here and it was awesome. I told them it was my first time trying their food and the employees were very helpful, thank you emuch! I'll definitely be eating here more often

sFiRk2oKpz5VaJ3xHQImrw.text: Super friendly and stupid good food  It felt more like eating a a friends house.  Loved it!

ZZoUoldZdJESgDR5AkX-7A.text: We went by Hummus Xpress one evening and were very surprised. When we arrived, we were a little bit skeptical and debating whether or not to even go in but I'm really glad we did! This little place is pretty much like Chipotle with Mediterranean food.  I didn't really know what would taste good together so I honestly just followed the recommendations of who was making my bowl. I think I ended up with rice, chicken, cilantro jalapeno hummus, garlic herb potatoes, tabbouleh, and some toppings. My date has gotten a bowl with some fried eggplant which was delicious .. I regretted not getting that!  This place seems a little bit expensive for lunch - mostly because I normally don't want that much food anyway but it's still much less than other options. I'll be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Bowl with rice, chicken, cilantro jalepeno hummus, and toppings.

cLrAcAKPveMkygQGBhBAmg.text: Came here for a lunch stop, based on Yelp reviews obviously, and was surprised by how fresh the food was. I got the two meat plate with chicken and gyro, and I could not have been more happy. Flavor is on point, meat is not overcooked, and all the sides are readily available for whatever your Mediterranean palate desires.  Tip: check in when you get here to get a free tea, which was also delicious.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Two meat plate with chicken and gyro.

aNzIVQTUZFefFDiEhcyyUg.text: Flavorful and fresh and healthy ! Trifecta ! Go here now , dont hesitate. Although it's in a strip mall,  the inside is quaint and pleasant .

fdE0v5SDV5g0UJXANMHgEg.text: This place has many vegan options and it's all labeled as you pick out what you want to eat. My falafel bowl was great! Loved the garlic hummus I had with it.

hY0j_jmtKbvgQT5BjVhZbQ.text: Good selection of fresh ingredients make for a good Medeterranian meal!  First, I like that this place isn't a chain. Many have compared it with Chipotle, because you build your email in a similar way. I would also say it's very much like Pita Bistro for the same reason. I think Pita Bistro has a greater variety, though.  Food: My meal was very tasty. I built a bowl with gyro meat, glazed sweet & spicy carrots, classic hummus, and topped with feta cheese, mixed pickled veggies, and garlic aioli. Everything was fresh tasting. The gyro meat was good, but nothing exceptional, and the garlic aioli was quite strong, but good!  Cost: With tax, my bowl was $8.71 - which is similar to other hummus & pita style places.  Also, I wanted to go low-carb, so I didn't want the rice that normally comes in the bowl. I was disappointed that they would not let me substitute another veggie to replace the rice.  Service:  When I arrived there was no queue, and the staff were friendly. I told them it was my first time there, and I was clearly undecided about what to get. But the staff didn't offer any suggestions, and didn't offer any samples to help me decide. I finally asked to sample one of the hummus, which they did, but they didn't offer any other samples. Last but not least, when I ordered my toppings I mentioned the garlic aioli, but was told tersely that wasn't a topping, it was a sauce. Really? Why the attitude?  Atmosphere: This is a typical strip-mall shop, but smaller.  Overall: I can see I'm in the minority with my 3-star review. They have an ok selection of ingredients and ok prices, but service wasn't up to par. I enjoyed my meal, so I might give it another try if I'm in the area.

Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Toppings

HTPV_nhMiSH2xwZ2K5XKpw.text: This place is so good and filling! I ate this a few times. You can make your own bowl and put how much of it you want. The owners of the restaurant are friendly and are usually working. I've ordered food for lunch and had it for both lunch and dinner because there was that much of it left over, it was so good! Definitely try this place out, you won't regret it.

RzS2S258YEkyrXKSA6h_yw.text: Good but a bit mild.   Chipotle Mediterranean.  Food is very reasonably priced for the quantity.

pCYh3Q5vVANG1m-9k4WuyA.text: I've now visited hummus xpress two times, and both have been amazing! I consider myself a lover of Greek/Mediterranean/Persian food, and this place is a fresh twist on the usual vibe in these types of restaurants. ALL of the food I've tried so far is super fresh, and the hummus choices are amazing!!  The staff has been super friendly and on point both times I've visited. We are even thinking about having them cater our wedding!   A must try.

W8AVv7iW51-dIxrx2k4Etw.text: This was my first time eating hummus like this.  Food was amazing! Very clean, and very friendly.  I highly recommend you eat here without delay. Savory, exploding with flavor and a hint of spice! I love this place! My new MUST EAT AT places in Tempe, AZ.!!

bBHYWQa4JQd_LsPbuuO0rA.text: This is the best place in the Phoenix area to get an authentic Pita. It really reminds me of Pita/falafel stands I have been to in the middle East.   Don't be afraid to try everything! It is all good.  My recommendation is to not miss out on the fried eggplant and schug.

fQRVUSq_PSDQ5F5f29QyZQ.text: I'll take any excuse to trek down to Tempe just so I can eat here! They have plenty of options for everybody and their ingredients are always the freshest fresh. Been here countless times and still crave it! The jalapeno cilantro hummus is awesome!

LGtZdKzc6T5epjk_YJSQJQ.text: Wife and I were headed on foot to another restaurant when we walked by Hummus Xpress.  We both love Mediterranean cuisine, but were reluctant to try it because it looked too "fast food," and we were looking for table service.  We are so thrilled we decided to give it a try.  Fresh and delicious doesn't quite do it justice.  The flavors were sensational, the ingredients many and varied, the choices, Pita, Bowl, Plate or Salad, gave us many options, each made to order, all focused on homemade middle-eastern favorites, such as tabbouleh, tzatziki, eggplant, pickled vegetables, spicy chicken, simmered beef, gyro, kalamata olives, chickpeas, and of course, fresh, homemade hummus in four flavors.  Every one was delicious.  We awarded HX five stars despite occasional, brief objectionable background music.  We will definitely return.

C3PoBoAzb3mZdoR2c6Sj7g.text: I absolutely love Hummus Xpress. Hands down one of the best Mediterranean restaurants in Tempe! I eat here probably once a week and always order their bowls.The braised beef is amazing, but if I'm not feeling meat, there are also a lot of delicious vegetables to add in place of it. Always a great selection of hummus as well! For about the same price as Chipotle, you get way more choices and they don't skimp on your fillings. I would recommend this place to anyone who has a taste for Mediterranean food. Be careful though, you'll get addicted!

uNPbkI4i1OaUzXS9wFtlFg.text: Great place! So many combinations of veggies, hummus, salads and sauces that my daughter and I can't wait to go back. She is vegan and there are so many options for her. We both had bowls with rice, eggplant, falafel, garlic hummus and the bean salad. We customized our veggies to our liking and we both had a delicious, very affordable, meal! Yum!

fRvigZVNaQLizNlhxyqdQA.text: I first started going to Hummus Xpress last summer and I really enjoyed it; however, these most recent trips have started to change my view of the restaurant. There seems to have been a lot of employee turnover as I never see the same people working there anymore, and the prices were increased for no apparent reason (food quality didn't go up, etc). This last trip I also think I was overcharged even above the new prices just because I ordered extra veggies (supposedly only a $.65 upcharge) but the bowl itself is only $9 and I was charged $11. The line was already crazy long and we were getting held up by the people in front of us who were charged incorrectly and had to get their money back, so I didn't want to hold the line up any further by protesting the charge. I don't think I will be returning at this point because the food/prices just don't seem to be worth it as of recent experiences.

SiGDyLlZpA14ALZnIJTfkQ.text: This is excellent quality Mediterranean food. I love the chipotle style ordering system and the people that work there are very nice. Meat wise the chicken and the beef are both excellent. All of the hummus choices are yummy but be mindful that the jalapeno hummus is really hot. Great food. Great service. The only thing I didn't love was the tabboleh. But it's not biggy because there is plenty to goose from.

hfw_HtSMy3dpGw1alrzFBA.text: Excellent service and amazing food. I stopped by on my way back to the office and didn't expect much of it. This place blew me away. From the moment I walked in. These guys were courteous and was patient as I make my decision on what to eat. Everything was flavorful. Don't think twice, just stop in!!!!   You have to try their falafel! Delish!

k4Wet-ccC6pBf_BYoMFbIQ.text: A friend of ours recommend this place, otherwise we probably would never even have known it existed. Now, it's easily turned into one of our favorite restaurants.  We went in not having any idea how the ordering process was going to work. The menu is a little confusing, because it's different, but the guy at the counter could tell we were newbs so jumped right in to help us out. Basically, you can choose from a couple different plates that are $5 or less, or start with a larger plate or bowl and add stuff to it from there. You end with sauces, and if you are vegan they label which you can eat.  I got the Hummus with Falafel. You get to choose up to two kinds of hummus and add all the topping you want (there are loads of interesting toppings to choose from). The falafel was AMAZING. Not dry and pasty at all. Hot and crispy on the outside and oh so light and fluffy on the inside. Some of the best I've had. The hummus was smooth and flavorful. I ended up with an amazing amount of food for less than $5!   My boyfriend got the gyro meat with herbed sweet potatoes with all kinds of other awesomeness. When it came time to eat, he said he couldn't get it into his face fast enough. So good!  He had a fountain drink and I made an Arnold Palmer with their unsweetened flavored iced tea per the guy at the counter's recommendation  (I think it was a peach lavender tea or something like that - it was very good and they also had a black tea and mint one too).  We'll be returning for sure. The people were incredibly nice and the food was affordable, of great quality and had great flavor. Quite the little gem in a city that feels like it is busting at the seams with Mediterranean cuisine.

_4G-y4A1i5bcxzZosazk5w.text: The food tasted amazing! I love how they have signs next to the food that tells me what is vegan. They give you tons of food! I always have leftovers on top of great costumer service every time! I definitely recommend this place to anyone!

HZePU4MsF9Agn5xoK8SlFA.text: I wish I could give it more stars! The BEST place for vegetarians/vegans! Balanced, healthy, tastiest mediterranean food ever.

j7h4XVdc0niv6bm-ld65EA.text: This place is pretty / really good. Like others reviewed it, it is like a healthier Chipolet without the upcharge on everything plus you leaving with felling of a healthy-full.  Customer service is outstanding. I wasn't aware of a couple of item choices and they helped me out with tasters and recommendations. Money-wise, best bang for your buck.

fnyQa_47WaFEwDoTcrKlpg.text: This is a really cool concept, and a very good value for the quantity and quality of food you get.

_fCzg-zcskz3XsDfODXisQ.text: Awesome concept for Mediterranean food (like Chipotle). The people were great and very friendly. The food was right up there with others I've had. Definitely give this place a try.   4 stars because of atmosphere. It's a very basic to-go feel. I'd still go again!

HowD4zVaYxmk0zSaUvdpHg.text: Since I have discovered this place October of 2015, I have been here easily 50+ times.  I'm 2nd in Check In's here for a reason.  Everything here is made in house every day with the freshest ingredients and the majority of it is vegan safe, they also offer a range of specialty drinks and pastry cupcakes as well to add variety to their menu.  The food is ALWAYS consistent and amazing.  When every I bring someone here to try it, they don't just say: "this is good", they say: "WOW.. This is AMAZING!".  They do an amazing job at personalizing your experience every time you go in, a place where everyone knows your name and they treat you like family, always greeting you and always telling to "have a wonderful day", always telling you "thank you for coming in today" and letting you know that your business is appreciated.  Hummus Xpress is hands down with out a doubt not only the best place I have ever eaten, but my favorite place to eat.  I'm very thankful they are around and I hope after reading this review you will come in for the same experience I have had again and again.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Not even 30 min after opening and the house is already packed, that&#39;s how you know this is the best in town!
Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. 100% Vegan Safe plate with the finest house made ingredients, including chopped tomatoes soaked in basil and vinegar, amazing!

IK7NCg-WcVPxQMSA1GRKGQ.text: This place is awesome. I went there for the first time today. I asked them how the menu combinations work, I also explained that I am vegan. They took their time to explain the menu to me, which I liked. There are so many different combinations you can throw together. Lots of meat for those that like that and plenty of fillers such as roasted veggies, salads, toppings and fantastic hummus. I got a bowl with a pita on the side. I would do a plate next time for dinner. The bowl is perfect for lunch. You get your choice of wheat or white pita. The staff is so respectful and helpful. I will definitely make this one of my regular weekly places to eat. Very excited to have found this place!

7b5ZIrGll8S0J-UQRODrmQ.text: Subway Mediterranean style.   A great, healthy option.  Pro's: Everything is fresh and made onsite.  No processed, pre-made foods here.  Cons: To many choices, options, combinations. But in a good way.    I opted for a plate.  After the meat and veggies, I was in the home stretch and got stuck in the hummus selections.  Guess I'll have to come back and try a new combination next time.  ;)

StS250ODNqtWjZ0wkz4Yow.text: This place has great vegan options, and in general has my favorite Mediterranean style food. Also they have a very friendly staff, go give it a try, you won't be disappointed!

WDYcRsPkif2-O1gsy6Qh_g.text: Hummus Xpress is legit! One of the best fast-casual restaurants in the Valley. Metro Phoenix is lousy with Mediterranean restaurants, and that's a good thing. I had a conversation with the owner about this, and we both agreed that Pita Jungle played a big part in spreading the growing acceptance and consumer love for this delicious cuisine.   The Mediterranean restaurants in town are all pretty damn good for the most part. I would be hard-pressed to pick a favorite. This one is right up there at the top of the list. In fact, I may just go ahead and make a list.   The way you order here is similar to eating at Chipotle or Q-doba, but instead of tortillas you're getting a pita and different fixings... except cheese. Pretty much everything you could pile onto a plate here is healthy, and it's all fresh. This would definitely make this a great place to try as your first foray into this type of food if you're a virgin.  The kitchen is immaculate and you can see it all from the dining room. The service is friendly and quick. And of course, the food is fresh and absolutely delicious. Since you get to pick what you want to eat, if you don't like it - it's pretty much your fault. I had a pita with beef and fixings, while my girlfriend had a chicken plate (which also comes with a pita, but you get extra protein). We both ate ourselves stuffed.   This strip used to be kinda dead - this spot used to be an always-empty Chinese place where the owner didn't give a shit anymore, but the new owner cleared out all remnants of what it used to be and transformed it into something great. The neighbor at Detroit Coney Grill did the same thing, and now this strip is bustling.   Hummus Xpress delivers (like actually delivers food to your door), so there's really no excuse to not try it. It was easy to give 5 stars here... I love this place. I will most definitely be back.

Y4m28rvVXnJo8mK7TnpKqQ.text: Whoa...I just had the hummus w/ chicken. Great price! Great portion! Almost couldn't finish it all. It was much better than I expected. The hummus was amazing. The employees were incredible nice and helpful. I'm upset I've waited this long to try it. I'll probably be back tomorrow. Heathy food at a good price...doesn't get much better than that for me.

lFNzi9Y9Lrh0DQuNa6Jfmw.text: We were set to fail. After watching Eat Street on the Cooking Channel, we new we were setting ourselves up for nothing but disappointment. Out we go to hunt for Moroccan food.  Hey, it's Mediterranean... it also starts with M.  THE PLACE: Very very simple. Not very big and not a lot of seats, but number of seating is just right for the space.  It was clean, although I didn't really checkout the rest room. Decor was very spartan.  THE FOOD: Think Chipotle style, where you get to choose between bowl, plate or a pita. You get a bang for your buck by getting a plate.  The food was tasty. We tried the Gyro and Aleppo Beef.  Had different 'Fill Its' like Rice Pilaf or Saffron Rice, Lemon Garlic Braised Kale, Fried Eggplant,  Char Grilled Tomatoes,  Tabouli Salad, Turkish Salad, Garbanzo Salad, Lentil kale salad, Glazed sweet and spicy carrots, Caramelized onions kale salad and more.  Hefty servings for the price.  THE SERVICE: Staff is very friendly and helpful. Willingly explains all your options, and lets you taste items before you pick out what you want on your plate.  Been here a few times now, and every time always felt welcome.

bMh6_YlvcjMx2Yy035Lfxw.text: I just had a ton of Hummus Xpress food at the Vegan Festival in Phoenix. The food was amazing! Truly! The guys preparing the food were so great. Don't miss out!

TbMPf649_nj2SE_S6ZuQUQ.text: Went here for a quick lunch, was mightily impressed by the choices, combinations, and flavors. I chose to do a plate and selected the grilled tomatoes, lamb, and chicken schwarma. I proceeded to try the lentil salad, and other sides. There were many different types of hummus and sauces to choose from. I can't wait to come back and try the others!.

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Big plate!

xNHLpZCoIt9g1e3zrE53YA.text: The best and yummiest of all pita places!! We have been here twice now and plan to come back for many more visits!

bRECZXnTjbq6gC_NjHqeKQ.text: Excellent!!  Terrific service, clean and the food was fantastic!  This was my first visit but I will be back for sure.

mUHOSZ0ITYko6fq1Drr8eA.text: This place is amazing. Friendly staff, fast food and a nice, small and cozy place to eat. Food is great. Love the different authentic toppings and the vast variety of hummus.  Good baklava as well.

Pafjv55QwdKKG1K6DMPPDg.text: I absolutely love this place. I have brought a lot of people here, and it never disappoints! The staff is friendly and the food is amazing. Warning: LOTS of garlic! But I love it. All fresh. Always good. The place is small, so if you come during a lunch rush, taking your order to go is a good option. The gyro meat is delish. The potatoes are AMAZING. Rotating variety of delicious hummus. I love the salads because the base includes kale but has romaine mixed in, too. It's a lot of food. You won't regret coming here! I do wish the pitas were served warm. That's probably my only criticism. Enjoy!

Gs2vOtf0qoRZmuwDYwWvQg.text: Update- The last two times I have been here and ordered my meal to go, I have unfortunately found hair in my food both times. I really love the food, but finding hair in your food really ruins it. Hummus Xpress I love you, but please be more careful when preparing and serving your food!

MRl3mPrnmHsAmHMC0CfDpA.text: I must say, it has been YEARS since i have been so excited about a restaurant as I was when I walked in to Hummas Xpress.  Food was awesome, portion was awesome, the staff was so friendly.  At one point I felt like I was being cheered on by all as I ordered each element of my platter... It was awesome.  Nice date night place too.  We took our food to go, but it was setup so nicely that next time we will have it to stay and enjoy ourselves a bit longer.

EGPeW3t65rpjohImHjoOyw.text: My boyfriend and I went not knowing what to expect and we were pleasantly surprised. Tons of options! Think Chipotle but Mediterranean and more side options. Overall VERY satisfied. Great flavors on all the different sides (again, so many options!) Looking for a good meal that's not too pricy? Hummus Xpress for sure. When I went there weren't many drink options. Canned soda and waters were all that you could purchase. I don't drink soda and sometimes water just doesn't hit the spot like a nice tea or other non-carbonated beverage would. I hope that once the business picks up this could be updated to provide other options.  It's a small place, but great menu/decor/atmosphere design inside (something I appreciate a lot). I hope this local & original place does well.

FOlqAqvaaXMP55KTDS0nyQ.text: Very flavorful and huge portions to make even a guy with a big appetite full. Highly recommended!

6fIjsGl5y6JbXSx5Xy1uPA.text: I took my dog to the vet and I stopped by here because of the great review, best decision of my life. I've been looking for a place I can buy my hummus fresh! Their chicken was perfectly grilled, and I got two meats so the falafel was awesome too. This is the first establishment to have excellent garlic alioli sauce since I came back from Spain. I will be back!!!

8zgOU1KUINoIybST0ad7tw.text: Worst Customer Service EVER.  The manager Eddie is not value its customers.  I tried to get a salad a certain way and he said no this is how it comes and if you don't like it you can go somewhere else, we have plenty of other customers.  DO NOT GO HERE!!!!!

r3II9DzNVMVBiyBuODnOJA.text: I really liked the concept of picking your own toppings, etcetera. Each item I picked was well done and tasted great. I was impressed.  The flavor blended well together on the plate. The portion was sizable.   I have it four stars as the meat had been sitting and was ok and the pita was reheated and dried out.   I will go back for sure.

WVixCIpNe7r8b5aL-PbJww.text: This place just created a TASTE-GASM on my tongue !  Best Mediterranean place around Tempe give this place a go !

photos.caption: Photo of Hummus Xpress - Tempe, AZ, United States. Yummmmm

ttUWlR7NPvjvhqK7edYD2w.text: Everything we had here was delicious!! As their name states, hummus is their specialty! All the flavors were delicious and we hear they switch out the flavors every so often so we will have to visit Arizona again to try out the others. The roasted eggplant was amazing and my boyfriend will vouch for the garlic herb potatoes. Our review is limited to what we tried but we both enjoyed the gyro meat as well. The staff there is hilarious and next time I'm letting them choose my plate, because all their selections were spot-on. A well-deserved 5 star for the food, people and local environment.

LxH7-RcPr1dkQ8qtszjc2A.text: So good every time!! We go here often on lunch break. The employees are super awesome and the food is awesome! Great spot!

cexnfg9quUCBGpN5VEU3aw.text: Excellent place to get some Greek/Mediterranean food. Found this place using yelp while on a business trip and the rating was spot on. They have many options for your bowl or pita sandwich and all the toppings are very flavorful. Try this place out if you are in the area.

J0_VGCSRxUwJET6eD3GMNQ.text: We found this place through yelp, love holes in the wall, personalized service intimate and cozy...nope! Not this place. We were rudely greeted (if you can call it a greeting) by the owner, who had an attitude,  told us to order right away or move out the way. I would have understood if the place was packed and we took longer than a minute to check out the menu. But nope! No one was behind us and we had just arrived.   We told him we were ready and aparently this bothered him since he asked us 3 questions in this order. 1. Is this your first time here? We said yes. 2. Do you have any questions?  Not yet, but we're ready to order. And #3 you should have questions,  this is your last chance.  We looked at each other thinking is this guy on drugs?? Cause he was hyped and angry....well who knows...we ordered the gyros. Don't care for the food. It was bland and they force you to add sides you didn't want. Who puts rice on a gyro???  I've had great Mediterranean and that was not it. Although bland the food was cooked right and there were some healthy choices. I would consider this place probably a modernized or westernized Chipotle style Mediterranean restaurant. So if you want classic, look else where.

qRLjMCH1ysrOl3ewkZ-2qQ.text: When I want delicious variety I come here. You can appease the meat eater in you or go vegan. It is all good. The pistachio baklava was pretty great too.

dQuI3Kmi4vvvPN8_oswG0g.text: Damn, yea this place is great. I like the comparison to Chipotle, it definitely fits. Its well priced, I got 2 meals for $8-9.  Standard Mediterranean faire, and well done. You could make all sorts of combos out of their selection. Definitely check it out either for lunch or dinner.

U59iTLCDnEndYWY-DEhaCg.text: This place is really good and authentic for $10 I had a huge plate of food the owner remembered us from our last visit. The beef brisket was amazing. This place is 5 stars all day.

NsIZaYu-awoRZTHETLKZ0A.text: The best Greek food in Tempe! My boyfriend and I love this place. I always get the bowl with kale-onion salad, lemon pepper broccoli, garlic herb potatoes, chicken and the cilantro jalepeno hummus. I recommend this place to anyone who likes a fast & healthy meal or to anyone who likes Greek food! Staff is so nice and always seems like they're having fun, makes for a great atmosphere!

zvMeafGrxFdkPd5jCYfXGw.text: If you like chipotle and you like Mediterranean food, then this hits the spot. The choices are better and the food is better.

5FDrh-xYKqrsljUc8n1TEA.text: Well, I've found my new go-to lunch spot for work. So many excellent things on the menu and everything is spiced to perfection. The staff is very kind and patient to people who have no idea what they want, or have never been there before-- even during lunch rush! So glad I checked this place out!!!

E_kT84PlBUch9Nw8kQsC1w.text: This place is like a Mediterranean Chipotle (and better). It's a small space, but it doesn't disappoint! They have a variety of hummus, meats, veggies, and sauces. They are priced the same as chipotle, but the quality of the food is better, in my opinion. Give it a try!
